start.text: Let me finish this cup of coffee.
You're under my direct control, prepare to die.
Another battle, more loot for us.
Enemies burning in? Let them come.

start_boss.text: A big enemy, huh. Doesn't matter. They always die.
Well, well, well. It is time to make things go boom.
Ready the missiles, we have a tough guy here.

retreat.text: Retreat they say, just kill the enemy damnit!
We are retreating? Who authorised that?
Tactical retreat, eat your vitamins next time.

need_help.text: I need assistance here, hurry up.
Need help, yes, this is included in the contract.

engaged.text: Play my favourite tune, will you?

pursuing.text: Move faster, don't let them get away!
Full speed ahead, disable shield generator!

running.text: Fall back! It's not worth it.
Reverse course! Get the ship out of here.

hull_90.text: Look, they can actually shoot at moving target.

hull_50.text: Might have to be more cautious. Ships are expensive after all.
Just press 'Ignore Errors' button and continue the engagement.

hull_30.text: Well, might as well drink the rest of the bottle.
Yes, yes, we're almost dead. Now shut up.
Hey, blowing up coffee machines isn't fair.

overload.text: They are going to send a fuckton of missiles now, don't they?
Sigh. Order nearby ships to cover us.
